author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...NARDA A LITTLE WEAKER BUT FORECAST TO RESTRENGTHEN ON FRIDAY...
summary: ...NARDA A LITTLE WEAKER BUT FORECAST TO RESTRENGTHEN ON FRIDAY... As of 2:00 PM MST Wed Sep 24 the center of Narda was located near 15.1, -112.3 with movement W at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 976 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...NARDA A LITTLE WEAKER BUT FORECAST TO RESTRENGTHEN ON FRIDAY... As of 2:00 PM MST Wed Sep 24 the center of Narda was located near 15.1, -112.3 with movement W at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 976 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Narda (EP4/EP142025)
